title: Signs of witchcraft in a dream: Dreams that show envy and the evil eye

preview.html: Symbols indicating touch and symbols indicating the exit of magic from the body and healing, whether burying black magic or drinking Ibn Sirin. A recurring dream of someone who sees predatory animals such as lions, tigers, wild dogs, etc. Of predatory animals, the monarch attacks, frightening a person and his intense fear of them, and also seeing monkeys in a dream symbolizes spiritual illness and is indicated by touching the jinn or jinn. Seeing camels, or as he calls them camels, was repeated, based on the hadith of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace: “No You pray in camel houses, because they were created with them. Jinn. They do not see their eyes and their condition if they apostatize, and they pray in sheepfolds, because they are closer to the Most Merciful.” Seeing a black snake repeatedly in a dream symbolizes magic and touch, especially seeing a person in his dream as if there was a black snake touching his leg and wrapping it around him or wrapping around the body of the dreamer. Seeing a black snake of Far in a dream means that the spiritual seer (jinn) is about to touch the fortuneteller, and the large size symbolizes his rank. Seeing cats and dogs repeatedly also symbolizes male jinn, referring to males and vice versa, especially black dogs and cats. Recurring seeing a hedgehog which symbolizes The jinn who lives with people in his house or lives in empty, desolate places frequently sees owls and bats, which is a type of touch and flight magic, and his vision shows that he was attacked by the seer, and therefore he prepared to harm the seer while he was harming him. The frequent sighting of a donkey and a pig symbolizes the Jewish and Christian jinn Also, the frequent sighting of insects, especially cockroaches, indicates the weakness of the jinn inhabiting the house. Seeing flying in a dream and falling from high places symbolizes flying jinn. Seeing intercourse and everything related to marital matters between spouses indicates the presence of jinn in love. Seeing many houses and graves Empty and abandoned indicates magic and extreme sorcery and seeing black men or women. Seeing a person in his dream with a swollen face indicates people’s hatred and envy towards him and increased backbiting and gossip against him. Toxins, impurities of any kind, and whoever sees that he is eating worms envies cruelty in food and living, a dog and a pig, a necklace, seeing the birth of male twins. And females together means that she will live a life full of luxury and happiness, but there will be people around her who envy her and hate her and will try to sabotage her happiness. Whoever dreams that he has a lit candle in his hand and someone extinguished it, this indicates someone who is jealous of the blessing within him. Ghosts entering homes or corpses. Snakes and scorpions. Cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s dream. It means envy of those around her, and whoever dreams that flies are biting his body, this indicates the envy of a group of inferior people who are jealous of his family and relatives. Whoever sees lice coming out of his hair shows the appearance of envy. Some well-known places and names in magic, such as the Pharaohs, Babylon, Harut, and Marut, if they have nothing to do with them, and I assure you that the symbols alone Its presence in the dream is not sufficient, and the presence of the rest of the symbols determines its interpretation. Dreaming of Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream means that he is a person who has enemies and neighbors who are jealous of him, and he flees from them, and takes revenge.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about divorce by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream; Seeing a divorce in general is an indication of the end of a difficult stage in life, with all the many hardships experienced and the most recent painful ones, and the associations that the vision carries through this article.Interpretation of a dream about divorceScientists believe that seeing a divorce in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s paradox in something, so Seeing divorce for a single person indicates that he will get rid of celibacy and soon enter into marriage, and it also indicates that the situation will change for the better. Seeing a man divorcing his wife is a sign of the man abandoning something important and valuable to him in life, in addition to being a symbol of problems and disagreements between them, in If he sees that he has divorced her once. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a divorce in a patient’s dream is one of the unpleasant visions. If he divorces her once, this means separation between them and the end of his married life. The religious person’s divorce is an expression and symbol of asceticism in this world, getting closer to God Almighty, and getting rid of all pleasures. Life, as for the sinner, it is a sign of repentance and abandonment of the path of disobedience and sins. Interpretation of the dream of divorce by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer has a prominent position and witnesses the divorce of his wife, this means his loss of that position, but if he is a merchant, the vision means loss, abandonment of the profession, and humiliation. Another thing. Ibn Sirin also says in the dream interpretation of divorce that it is a symbol of threat, discomfort, and stability in a man’s life, in addition to a feeling of fear of making fateful decisions. Seeing divorce in a dream can be a sign of important opportunities that a person has lost from his hands and feels regret about. As for Dreaming of a verbal divorce in front of one’s parents is an expression of pressure and many psychological and mental problems. The presence of some issues between family members. Divorce in a dream symbolizes the loss of someone dear and dear to you, separation from a job, or getting rid of something that is expensive to you. It is also a sign of anger, recklessness, and haste in making decisions. If the dreamer is suffering from psychological problems and stress Many in his life, this vision is one of the happy visions that warns him to get rid of them and the emergence of positive changes in his life. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for a single woman: Divorce in a dream for an unmarried woman, Imam Nabulsi interpreted it as overcoming many obstacles in life to achieve goals, but if she is in a romantic relationship, This means the end of this relationship after this person’s lie is revealed. Divorcing an unmarried woman in front of her friend means separating them either due to travel or death, which causes her great psychological shock. If the girl sees that she is the one asking for divorce, this means that she will soon take a bold step in her life and will transform Her life for the better, this also indicates that she will leave work and find the best profession. The divorce of the unmarried people surrounding her, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as many family problems surrounding her, and she will get rid of them, but it will lead to the rupture of the womb between them. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for a married woman: Seeing divorce In a married woman’s dream, it is a symbol of the psychological pressures she is experiencing in her life and below

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s winter dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about winter: For many people, winter is considered one of the most beloved seasons of the year, as its events rejoice souls and comfort hearts. As the rain and snow fall, the senses are renewed. Some may see winter in a dream with different characteristics and you are wondering if it is good to see winter in a dream? Or does the presence of snow, rain, and storm indicate some bad things? Interpretation of a dream about winter. What is the interpretation of a dream about winter? A dream about winter is considered one of the happy dreams that people see because most of the interpretations accompanying it were good and referred to food and goodness, while there were some interpretations that say that events Severe winters, such as heavy rain and thunder, can indicate some problems and sorrows in a person’s life. A sick person’s vision of winter in a dream foretells the coming recovery, and the dreamer’s vision of winter while bathing in rain water shows the goodness of his condition, religion, and closeness to the Great and Most High Lord. If one is suffering from A poor livelihood and lack of money, and he saw rain falling in his dream, this heralds the end of the difficult circumstances he is going through. As for seeing a heavy winter accompanied by heavy rains afflicting the land with problems, destroying homes, and uprooting crops, it has been interpreted as one of the dreams that indicate worries and sorrow. What is the interpretation? Ibn Sirin’s winter dream? Ibn Sirin confirms that seeing winter in a dream is one of the good things that indicates abundant goodness and livelihood. Ibn Sirin believes that I am the man. If he sees that winter has negatively affected the land, this indicates that the people who inhabit that land are suffering from a lot of pain. If a person sees heavy rain in his dream and the rain falls at night, this indicates the abundance of goodness in the country and that there is a decrease in prices that leads to happiness. People and their comfort. As for seeing the sky from which blood falls, it confirms, according to Ibn Sirin, that there is widespread injustice in the country because of the ruler in addition to the presence of disease. Heavy and heavy rain is evidence of worries and is not among the praiseworthy visions that a person sees. Your dream will be interpreted in Seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. What is the interpretation of Nabulsi’s winter dream? Al-Nabulsi believes that winter in a dream is a sign of receiving good and good things that satisfy the heart and comfort the soul. If one sees rain falling from the sky and uprooting plants, fruits and trees, this confirms the presence of Many differences and problems that reach the point of conflict between individuals. Seeing rain falling from the sky and it is blood, this indicates the many sins that the dreamer carries and he must repent and turn away from them because this is a sign of his warning. Seeing rain falling from the sky, and reviving a specific thing that died on the earth, It is food for him and a blessing for him. If a person drinks water that falls from the rain and it is clean and good, it indicates an improvement in his condition. If he eats rain water if it is spoiled or contaminated, this indicates that he is infected with the disease. Rain falling in a certain place indicates the presence of problems and fears in The dreamer's life narrows his heart and he seeks to get rid of it. If he sees that...

title: Interpretation of dreams: My husband married his sister to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband married his sister in a dream. It is one of the strange visions interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, as it carries many good and praiseworthy meanings today. Let's look at the interpretation of the vision according to the facts and elements that the dreamer saw in his dream. I dreamed that my husband married his sister. If she saw in a dream that her husband married his sister, the dream may be a sign of the strong relationship and relationship between the husband and his sister and does not necessarily lead to something bad. When the dreamer sees that her husband married a relative, the vision may indicate a good relationship between the husband and his family or that there are other things in common between them that increased their relationship. If a woman sees in a dream that her husband is marrying his sister, this may be an indication that he is good to his wife and cares about her and her condition and does not skimp on her in anything. I dreamed that my husband married his sister according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the husband marry his sister according to Ibn Sirin indicates the husband's kindness to his family and his justice towards them. If a married woman dreams that the husband marries his sister in a dream, this indicates her husband's generosity and love for his family. When the wife sees that the husband marries his sister, this may indicate that the fortuneteller will soon become pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. The dream of a married woman's husband marrying his sister in a dream may be a sign of the prestigious position that he will obtain Soon. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google's online dream interpretation site. I dreamed that my husband married his married sister. Seeing a mixed marriage can be a sign of strong relationships and bonds between the husband and his family, or that there are common goals and tasks between them. The dream may also indicate that the dreamer's husband takes care of his family and acquaintances with words and actions, and his wife is upset about that, especially if she feels that her right over her husband is non-existent. I dreamed that my husband married his pregnant sister. Many dream interpreters say that the husband who marries his pregnant wife to another beautiful woman, this dream shares her safety and the safety of the newborn, God willing. If the wife the husband married has bad traits, this vision indicates that the pregnant woman will face some problems in her pregnancy. However, if the pregnant woman sees that her husband married a dead woman or married someone known to the dreamer who has already died, this vision may be an indication of achieving what he wanted and tried hard to reach. I dreamed that my husband married my friend. If the dreamer sees her friend giving her husband a new, white dress, then this vision shows what the dreamer's friend is like towards her husband, because she loves him and wants to marry him. And if the owner of the dream sees her husband taking this dress from her friend and wearing it and tying it in a knot, then all these events indicate the existence of a secret relationship or marriage bond between the dreamer's friend and her husband. The vision may be just anxiety and jealousy issued by the dreamer to her friend and because of her fear of increasing her married life, her subconscious mind imagines that her husband is marrying her friend, but this is not true. Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my sister Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my sister This is an indication that the man is thinking of marrying another woman because of the woman's suspicion and jealousy of her. Perhaps the vision indicates a change in the husband's profession and

title: The most important evidence for seeing the ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream? Seeing a ruler in a dream is one of the greatest visions promising more good deeds. Whoever dreams that he meets the ruler and he is smiling, the vision means that he will obtain a lot of sustenance, and the bowing of the hands to the ruler is evidence of high status, and we learn more interpretations by following us in this article. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the ruler in A dream about a ruler or a sultan, if they see them in a dream, the dream is divided into two parts: Whether or not: The smiling ruler shows the dreamer’s good behavior and his behavior is completely free of sins and immorality. Secondly: Whoever sees in a dream an angry ruler and addresses him with bad words, this is interpreted by the dreamer’s corruption of morals and his distance from God because of his love. For the pleasures of life and the pursuit of satisfying desire. One interpreter confirmed that the ruler can be interpreted as the father of the dreamer, meaning that the head of the family is the father and is embodied in the dream in the form of one of the sultans or rulers. In this case, if the sultan or president is seen in the dream and he is happy, and he speaks With positive words to the pioneer, and praised his morals, this indicates the approval of the dreamer’s father towards him and their strong relationship between them. Interpretation of seeing the ruler in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen the dreamer sits with the ruler in a dream, and they talk about an important topic, this is a rise and a high reason that the dreamer will achieve. If the fortuneteller meets the ruler And eat delicious food with him, he will defeat his enemies and achieve great success in business and money. Whoever takes clothes from the ruler in a dream will be in power in the near future, and when the dreamer sees that the sultan or ruler gives him a large crown decorated with jewels, he will achieve his goals according to his normal life. The merchant gets a lot of money. Seeing an unjust ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin: It is not good to see an unjust ruler in a dream, especially if the dreamer has been afflicted by him. However, if the dreamer sees that he is fighting with this king and defeating him, then he is a strong enemy trying to defeat the dreamer. But God protects him from it. Ibn Sirin said that the appearance of a king or ruler in a dream and the dreamer sitting with him is evidence that he is distinguished by some of his qualities, and therefore seeing the unjust king and the dreamer talking to him means being wronged. Around him and his rule over them, and he should not continue to oppress others and oppress them, as this is the end of the matter. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ruler for a single woman. Seeing a ruler in a dream for an unmarried girl means that good things will happen in her life. If she sees that she is greeting the governor or the president, this vision means that she She has reached a high position in her knowledge or in her work if she is working. If an unmarried girl sees that she goes to the governor and talks to him about her affairs, this indicates that she finds a solution to all the problems she faces in her life. Seeing the ruler for an unmarried girl may indicate marriage if He was seen wearing it or placing a crown on her head, but if she dreams that she refuses to meet the ruler or sultan, this is evidence that she does so. She is not doing well in the most important things in her life and that there are many opportunities that...

If an unmarried girl sees that she goes to the governor and talks to him about her affairs, this indicates that she finds a solution to all the problems she faces in her life. Seeing the ruler for an unmarried girl may indicate marriage if He was seen wearing it or placing a crown on her head, but if she dreams that she refuses to meet the ruler or sultan, this is evidence that she does so. She is not doing well in the most important things in her life and that there are many opportunities that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about bribery

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream, which is considered one of the bad things that can happen to a person in his life, and we can see that bribery is in fact a big mistake, but in a dream it expresses a large number of different things, and the difference depends on what the dreamer sees, as the interpretation varies according to The situation in which the dreamer is actually in. Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of this dream depends on a large number of signs about what she sees in her life, and among the interpretations are the following: If this woman sees that she is offering a bribe to a stranger, this indicates that she cannot keep In her home. If this woman sees that she has not taken a bribe from a man, this indicates that she is protecting her home with all the power that God has given her. Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream for a single woman. In order for us to be able to interpret this dream, we need to know the situation of this girl on the ground, because she It varies depending on the psychological state and according to what she is experiencing in her life, and among the interpretations that are important to her are the following: When a girl sees that there is a young man offering her a bribe, and this young man has handsome features, and he is with her at work, this indicates her ability to stay away from this work in a bad way. If this girl sees that someone is offering her a bribe, but she refuses, this indicates that she fears God and does not do anything forbidden. Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman fears for her fetus a lot, and that is why she searches for an interpretation, and among the interpretations of this dream are the following: When she sees this If the lady rejected this bribe, this indicates that she has high morals, and it also shows that she will give birth to a beautiful son. If this lady sees that she is taking a bribe from someone, but she wakes up to the sound of someone crying, this indicates that she has high morals and shows that she is retreating. All of her actions. Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream for a man. Many scholars have interpreted many interpretations of this dream, including the following: When a man sees that he refused to take a bribe from an old man, this indicates that this man was protected by God from a great disaster. In the event that This man refused to take a bribe from a girl with a high level of beauty, as this indicates that he has high morals. Seeing a bribe from a young girl smiling at you means that you will soon enjoy a high degree of kindness. Interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream. The interpretations and connotations that indicate this dream vary. Depending on what the dreamer sees, and among the interpretations that concern him are the following: When a person sees that he is taking a bribe from others by force, this indicates that he is taking a lot of the orphan’s money, and this is something that God has forbidden us from doing. If he sees that he is offering a bribe to someone and taking it from him, this indicates However, he is trying to mislead people and oppress them. If he sees that he gets angry in a dream when someone makes money, this indicates that he seeks to be a pure and pure person. In conclusion, we learned the interpretation of a dream about bribery in a dream, and we also learned that this dream is one of the dreams that differ Its interpretations depend on what a person sees and what he experiences.

title: I dream that I am sick

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream for a single girl: If a girl sees in her dream that she is afflicted with an illness. It may be a sign that she enjoys great beauty and health, thank God. In the dream of an unmarried girl, a serious illness appears. It shows that she will enter into a love relationship in the near future. If the girl If she suffers from a fever in her dream, this may mean that she will get married soon, or perhaps she will be engaged. But if this illness is cured and she recovers during her sleep, this is evidence that this engagement will not end. And God knows best. Wearing a wedding dress while the girl is sick in her dream. It could be a sign of the right to get married and engaged, God willing. Illness in an unmarried girl’s dream could be a sign that she is suffering from poverty and lack of livelihood. He can see illness in a girl’s dream. A sign of That he cannot live and may struggle to obtain it. A single girl who sees her illness in a dream is a sign that she cannot reach the things she wants because there is something in her way. As for the case of an unmarried girl, she saw her father sick in a dream. It may symbolize This dream indicates that she is not satisfied with the actions she takes or the decisions she makes. She has to defend herself a little because of this dream and change the things she does. It is not good to see cancer affecting a girl in her dream. It shows that she will face difficulties in her life and the obstacles that stand before her. Seeing hair loss due to the cancer that the girl is suffering from in her dream. Mahmoud does not indicate that he will leave the job. When she sees cancer in her stomach while she is sleeping, this is not good. Because it indicates that she will be exposed to problems with her family and she will have to pray a lot to God until this ordeal ends. If a girl has cancer in her uterus, this is not good. It indicates that she will have disagreements and problems in her relationship or in a relationship with someone. See also: Sickness in a dream about another person. Interpretation of the appearance of sickness in a dream for a married woman. Seeing sickness in a dream for a married woman is A good sign of her loyalty to him and her devotion to him and that she loves her husband very much. To see illness in a married woman’s dream is considered a sign of her suffering a lot from the problems that arise with her husband, and the arguments that always continue with her. A married woman stands with her husband in a dream after being afflicted with a serious illness in a dream. It indicates the strong relationship that unites them, full of love and affection between them. Seeing cancer in her dream indicates. It is only a sign of weak faith, and she must get closer and closer to God with obedience. She may dream of lung cancer. A warning about the sins she is committing, she must repent quickly To God. Having a skin disease is evidence of her husband’s loyalty to her. He is also a man of good morals who should thank God a lot. Seeing a skin disease in a dream means that this woman will obtain abundant money during a certain period. Interpretation of seeing a disease in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a man sees Seeing illness in a dream, this dream indicates that he is in good health. Also, seeing illness could be a warning that he is living in a lot of hypocrisy and hypocrisy.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a husband buying clothes for his wife

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a husband buying clothes for his wife? The interpretation of a husband buying clothes for his wife in a dream: It indicates renewed love between them, especially if the clothes are new. It should be noted that the type of clothes and the fabrics made from them are interpreted with many meanings that will be known in the following lines, as silk differs. Of linen or wool, and therefore these indicators will be explained through the following article.You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a husband buying clothes for his wife. If the husband buys clothes for his wife in a dream, and the two quarrel or have many differences in reality, they will soon reconcile. When a man buys his wife new silk clothes, knowing that he is poor and that his financial situation is difficult in In reality, he was given a patient and loving wife, and she was able to live with him in his life without getting bored. The vision announces to him that the Lord of the Worlds is granting him abundant money and wealth, which will make him compensate his wife for the poverty she is experiencing. If the husband buys loose clothes for his wife in a dream, this is a strong indication of Cover, a quiet life, and an increase in money. But if he bought her tight clothes and when she wore them, she felt tight, then the dream may indicate problems that will appear soon or the presence of some major personal differences between them that will make the woman unable to adapt to her husband and complete her life. With him. The jurists said that a man who buys his wife beautiful, wide-fitting clothes is evidence that he does not talk about her faults in front of people, as he deliberately conceals them, and this good behavior will be supported by God Almighty with goodness. If a woman sees her husband giving her a gift of beautiful but different clothes, which she has never seen before, then the dream indicates a new life coming to her, and perhaps she will travel abroad with him and live a life of abundance. And well-being. If the dreamer’s husband has already died and she sees him giving her new and beautiful clothes, then she will stop the sadness and crying that she experienced for long periods after losing him, and she can get married again or live in happiness and prosperity. May God give her money and stability. Explanation of the husband buying clothes for his wife by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees that her husband has bought her a different set of new clothes that are free of dirt, then this is a stable married life that she will enjoy and free of problems. But if she sees that the clothes he bought for her are full of dirt and stains, The dream is bad and may indicate an imbalance in their relationship as a result of a lot of arguments. Perhaps the dream shows the envy that spoiled their lives, causing them to separate from each other, and not feel happy together. If a woman sees that the clothes are inappropriate and she has many cut parts that have distorted the general shape of the clothes, This symbol is a strong sign of differences between the fortuneteller and her husband. If she sees her husband buying beautiful clothes embroidered with precious stones, the dream promises her that he loves her deeply, and if this woman is an employee in reality, the dream expresses a big promotion at work and if she wants to get Fame is in her life because she is talented and has certain skills, so the dream means that she will be his

title: Interpretation of the fetus in a dream - to see the fetus in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about a fetus for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, whether the sex of the baby is male, a boy, a female or a girl, and the mother’s abortion of a dead fetus. From the womb or outside the womb, the appearance of the infant and Ibn Sirin More Interpretation of the fetus in a dream Seeing the fetus indicates goodness, beauty, beautiful signs, sweet news and surprises and it will be a new beginning for the vision. It is said that if she is already pregnant and sees the movement of the fetus in her stomach, if she is in the first months, then she will give birth to a child. Of the same sex as the fetus moving in her womb, if she. She loved that fetus in her sleep and was happy with it, or she would put her hand to feel its movement in a dream. But if it was in the last months, the dream may be due to her exhaustion and psychological exhaustion and waiting and thinking about the birth of the new baby, and this may facilitate her birth and the arrival of her child safely and securely. And a dream The fetus is good news, good news for the Almighty, according to the Almighty’s saying: (And We gave him good news of a boy of knowledge). This vision also tells about opposites that will be beneficial and that will end happily. This vision expresses renewal and beauty. Seeing a fetus in a dream indicates the dreams and fantasies of the dreamer, and the fetus is evidence that when the time comes, he will achieve all his dreams, desires and plans one after the other, and for this reason only patience and time are needed. It indicates that in order for the life of the dreamer to go well Better, to experience more happiness and to realize his hopes, he must work harder and more carefully, and if he does this, he will have done for himself the most good. Thus, he will easily find solutions to all problems. In order to spend happy days, the person with the vision, whether in his personal or professional life, must take care of himself first, then think carefully about his decisions, and then choose what is most appropriate for him. If he makes a decision without thinking, it is expected that he will fall into major crises, and find himself in situations that he does not want to fall into. The vision indicates that working conditions will improve and all dreams will be fulfilled and he will find solutions to his problems and live very happily with those he loves and appreciates. It indicates that the owner of the vision will achieve successes Large profits and profits as a result of completing many projects in his professional life, and for this reason he will get rid of his worries and problems and soon he will establish an independent business and manage his business to the fullest for this reason. The dreamer has great self-confidence and will take various actions that will amaze those around him. At the same time, it indicates that he will become rich. It indicates that the visionary is under intense pressure, so he will remember his days of comfort and happiness and his days with friends and loved ones. A dream of a fetus for an unmarried woman. An unmarried woman’s dream of a fetus is comfort and pleasure, and seeing a fetus in her stomach informs the unmarried woman that something Pleasant awaits her. If she is engaged, the dream indicates that she will get married soon. If an unmarried woman sees that the fetus is moving a lot in her stomach, it is possible that something bad awaits her, a misfortune, sadness, or the loss of a loved one. If the fetus is male, it will lose a man, and if it is female, it will lose a woman. Miscarriage in a dream will result in miscarriage

It indicates that the visionary is under intense pressure, so he will remember his days of comfort and happiness and his days with friends and loved ones. A dream of a fetus for an unmarried woman. An unmarried woman’s dream of a fetus is comfort and pleasure, and seeing a fetus in her stomach informs the unmarried woman that something Pleasant awaits her. If she is engaged, the dream indicates that she will get married soon. If an unmarried woman sees that the fetus is moving a lot in her stomach, it is possible that something bad awaits her, a misfortune, sadness, or the loss of a loved one. If the fetus is male, it will lose a man, and if it is female, it will lose a woman. Miscarriage in a dream will result in miscarriage
